name: JavaScript Mini Projects
description: Beginner-level JavaScript projects to practice DOM manipulation, event handling, and timers.

name: TypeRush
description: Terminal-based Typing Speed Test game in C++ that measures WPM and accuracy in real-time.

name: Bio Page — React Static Page
description: A personal About Me static site built with React + Vite and deployed to GitHub Pages.

name: Padhlo AI
description: AI-powered study assistant to generate structured notes and quizzes using the Gemini API.

name: PawPal — Digital Network for Animal Welfare (Prototype)
description: Prototype platform to support animal welfare in Pakistan by connecting public with shelters, vets, and resources.

name: Vibe Snitch — Personality Prediction Desktop App
description: Predicts MBTI personality type based on user text inputs, using ML and Gemini AI.

name: ML-Supervised
description: Hands-on repository for supervised machine learning in Python focused on Linear and Logistic Regression with from-scratch and scikit-learn implementations.

name: StayTracked
description: StayTracked is a simple Project Tracking System developed in Java with a MySQL database. It helps users manage projects, track progress, and handle team accounts using OOP principles like inheritance and polymorphism.

name: RedactedVault
description: A stealthy, secure vault application disguised as a calculator. Unlocks a hidden vault with biometric authentication (Auth2X) supporting AES encryption, facial recognition, and fingerprint verification.

name: Auth2X
description: A dual-mode biometric authentication system supporting face recognition and fingerprint matching. Uses AES-encrypted storage of biometric data and integrates with a Tkinter GUI for registration and authentication.
